00033 
00034 static int      btGetHash(int partId, int triangleIndex)
00035 {
00036         int hash = (partId<<(31-MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS)) | triangleIndex;
00037         return hash;
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 static btScalar btGetAngle(const btVector3& edgeA, const btVector3& normalA,const btVector3& normalB)
00043 {
00044         const btVector3 refAxis0  = edgeA;
00045         const btVector3 refAxis1  = normalA;
00046         const btVector3 swingAxis = normalB;
00047         btScalar angle = btAtan2(swingAxis.dot(refAxis0), swingAxis.dot(refAxis1));
00048         return  angle;
00049 }

00051 
00052 struct btConnectivityProcessor : public btTriangleCallback
00053 {
00054         int                             m_partIdA;
00055         int                             m_triangleIndexA;
00056         btVector3*              m_triangleVerticesA;
00057         btTriangleInfoMap*      m_triangleInfoMap;
00058 
00059 
00060         virtual void processTriangle(btVector3* triangle, int partId, int triangleIndex)
00061         {
00062                 //skip self-collisions
00063                 if ((m_partIdA == partId) && (m_triangleIndexA == triangleIndex))
00064                         return;
00065 
00066                 //skip duplicates (disabled for now)
00067                 //if ((m_partIdA <= partId) && (m_triangleIndexA <= triangleIndex))
00068                 //      return;
00069 
00070                 //search for shared vertices and edges
00071                 int numshared = 0;
00072                 int sharedVertsA[3]={-1,-1,-1};
00073                 int sharedVertsB[3]={-1,-1,-1};
00074 
00076                 btScalar crossBSqr = ((triangle[1]-triangle[0]).cross(triangle[2]-triangle[0])).length2();
00077                 if (crossBSqr < m_triangleInfoMap->m_equalVertexThreshold)
00078                         return;
00079 
00080 
00081                 btScalar crossASqr = ((m_triangleVerticesA[1]-m_triangleVerticesA[0]).cross(m_triangleVerticesA[2]-m_triangleVerticesA[0])).length2();
00083                 if (crossASqr< m_triangleInfoMap->m_equalVertexThreshold)
00084                         return;
00085 
00086 #if 0
00087                 printf("triangle A[0]   =       (%f,%f,%f)\ntriangle A[1]       =       (%f,%f,%f)\ntriangle A[2]       =       (%f,%f,%f)\n",
00088                         m_triangleVerticesA[0].getX(),m_triangleVerticesA[0].getY(),m_triangleVerticesA[0].getZ(),
00089                         m_triangleVerticesA[1].getX(),m_triangleVerticesA[1].getY(),m_triangleVerticesA[1].getZ(),
00090                         m_triangleVerticesA[2].getX(),m_triangleVerticesA[2].getY(),m_triangleVerticesA[2].getZ());
00091 
00092                 printf("partId=%d, triangleIndex=%d\n",partId,triangleIndex);
00093                 printf("triangle B[0]   =       (%f,%f,%f)\ntriangle B[1]       =       (%f,%f,%f)\ntriangle B[2]       =       (%f,%f,%f)\n",
00094                         triangle[0].getX(),triangle[0].getY(),triangle[0].getZ(),
00095                         triangle[1].getX(),triangle[1].getY(),triangle[1].getZ(),
00096                         triangle[2].getX(),triangle[2].getY(),triangle[2].getZ());
00097 #endif
00098 
00099                 for (int i=0;i<3;i++)
00100                 {
00101                         for (int j=0;j<3;j++)
00102                         {
00103                                 if ( (m_triangleVerticesA[i]-triangle[j]).length2() < m_triangleInfoMap->m_equalVertexThreshold)
00104                                 {
00105                                         sharedVertsA[numshared] = i;
00106                                         sharedVertsB[numshared] = j;
00107                                         numshared++;
00109                                         if(numshared >= 3)
00110                                                 return;
00111                                 }
00112                         }
00114                         if(numshared >= 3)
00115                                 return;
00116                 }
00117                 switch (numshared)
00118                 {
00119                 case 0:
00120                         {
00121                                 break;
00122                         }
00123                 case 1:
00124                         {
00125                                 //shared vertex
00126                                 break;
00127                         }
00128                 case 2:
00129                         {
00130                                 //shared edge
00131                                 //we need to make sure the edge is in the order V2V0 and not V0V2 so that the signs are correct
00132                                 if (sharedVertsA[0] == 0 && sharedVertsA[1] == 2)
00133                                 {
00134                                         sharedVertsA[0] = 2;
00135                                         sharedVertsA[1] = 0;
00136                                         int tmp = sharedVertsB[1];
00137                                         sharedVertsB[1] = sharedVertsB[0];
00138                                         sharedVertsB[0] = tmp;
00139                                 }
00140 
00141                                 int hash = btGetHash(m_partIdA,m_triangleIndexA);
00142 
00143                                 btTriangleInfo* info = m_triangleInfoMap->find(hash);
00144                                 if (!info)
00145                                 {
00146                                         btTriangleInfo tmp;
00147                                         m_triangleInfoMap->insert(hash,tmp);
00148                                         info = m_triangleInfoMap->find(hash);
00149                                 }
00150 
00151                                 int sumvertsA = sharedVertsA[0]+sharedVertsA[1];
00152                                 int otherIndexA = 3-sumvertsA;
00153 
00154                                 
00155                                 btVector3 edge(m_triangleVerticesA[sharedVertsA[1]]-m_triangleVerticesA[sharedVertsA[0]]);
00156 
00157                                 btTriangleShape tA(m_triangleVerticesA[0],m_triangleVerticesA[1],m_triangleVerticesA[2]);
00158                                 int otherIndexB = 3-(sharedVertsB[0]+sharedVertsB[1]);
00159 
00160                                 btTriangleShape tB(triangle[sharedVertsB[1]],triangle[sharedVertsB[0]],triangle[otherIndexB]);
00161                                 //btTriangleShape tB(triangle[0],triangle[1],triangle[2]);
00162 
00163                                 btVector3 normalA;
00164                                 btVector3 normalB;
00165                                 tA.calcNormal(normalA);
00166                                 tB.calcNormal(normalB);
00167                                 edge.normalize();
00168                                 btVector3 edgeCrossA = edge.cross(normalA).normalize();
00169 
00170                                 {
00171                                         btVector3 tmp = m_triangleVerticesA[otherIndexA]-m_triangleVerticesA[sharedVertsA[0]];
00172                                         if (edgeCrossA.dot(tmp) < 0)
00173                                         {
00174                                                 edgeCrossA*=-1;
00175                                         }
00176                                 }
00177 
00178                                 btVector3 edgeCrossB = edge.cross(normalB).normalize();
00179 
00180                                 {
00181                                         btVector3 tmp = triangle[otherIndexB]-triangle[sharedVertsB[0]];
00182                                         if (edgeCrossB.dot(tmp) < 0)
00183                                         {
00184                                                 edgeCrossB*=-1;
00185                                         }
00186                                 }
00187 
00188                                 btScalar        angle2 = 0;
00189                                 btScalar        ang4 = 0.f;
00190 
00191 
00192                                 btVector3 calculatedEdge = edgeCrossA.cross(edgeCrossB);
00193                                 btScalar len2 = calculatedEdge.length2();
00194 
00195                                 btScalar correctedAngle(0);
00196                                 //btVector3 calculatedNormalB = normalA;
00197                                 bool isConvex = false;
00198 
00199                                 if (len2<m_triangleInfoMap->m_planarEpsilon)
00200                                 {
00201                                         angle2 = 0.f;
00202                                         ang4 = 0.f;
00203                                 } else
00204                                 {
00205 
00206                                         calculatedEdge.normalize();
00207                                         btVector3 calculatedNormalA = calculatedEdge.cross(edgeCrossA);
00208                                         calculatedNormalA.normalize();
00209                                         angle2 = btGetAngle(calculatedNormalA,edgeCrossA,edgeCrossB);
00210                                         ang4 = SIMD_PI-angle2;
00211                                         btScalar dotA = normalA.dot(edgeCrossB);
00213                                         isConvex = (dotA<0.);
00214 
00215                                         correctedAngle = isConvex ? ang4 : -ang4;
00216                                 }
00217 
00218                                 
00219 
00220                                 
00221                                                         
00222                                 //alternatively use 
00223                                 //btVector3 calculatedNormalB2 = quatRotate(orn,normalA);
00224 
00225 
00226                                 switch (sumvertsA)
00227                                 {
00228                                 case 1:
00229                                         {
00230                                                 btVector3 edge = m_triangleVerticesA[0]-m_triangleVerticesA[1];
00231                                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,-correctedAngle);
00232                                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,normalA);
00233                                                 btScalar bla = computedNormalB.dot(normalB);
00234                                                 if (bla<0)
00235                                                 {
00236                                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00237                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V0V1_SWAP_NORMALB;
00238                                                 }
00239 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00240                                                 if ((computedNormalB-normalB).length()>0.0001)
00241                                                 {
00242                                                         printf("warning: normals not identical\n");
00243                                                 }
00244 #endif//DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00245 
00246                                                 info->m_edgeV0V1Angle = -correctedAngle;
00247 
00248                                                 if (isConvex)
00249                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V0V1_CONVEX;
00250                                                 break;
00251                                         }
00252                                 case 2:
00253                                         {
00254                                                 btVector3 edge = m_triangleVerticesA[2]-m_triangleVerticesA[0];
00255                                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,-correctedAngle);
00256                                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,normalA);
00257                                                 if (computedNormalB.dot(normalB)<0)
00258                                                 {
00259                                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00260                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V2V0_SWAP_NORMALB;
00261                                                 }
00262 
00263 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00264                                                 if ((computedNormalB-normalB).length()>0.0001)
00265                                                 {
00266                                                         printf("warning: normals not identical\n");
00267                                                 }
00268 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00269                                                 info->m_edgeV2V0Angle = -correctedAngle;
00270                                                 if (isConvex)
00271                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V2V0_CONVEX;
00272                                                 break;  
00273                                         }
00274                                 case 3:
00275                                         {
00276                                                 btVector3 edge = m_triangleVerticesA[1]-m_triangleVerticesA[2];
00277                                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,-correctedAngle);
00278                                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,normalA);
00279                                                 if (computedNormalB.dot(normalB)<0)
00280                                                 {
00281                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V1V2_SWAP_NORMALB;
00282                                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00283                                                 }
00284 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00285                                                 if ((computedNormalB-normalB).length()>0.0001)
00286                                                 {
00287                                                         printf("warning: normals not identical\n");
00288                                                 }
00289 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00290                                                 info->m_edgeV1V2Angle = -correctedAngle;
00291 
00292                                                 if (isConvex)
00293                                                         info->m_flags |= TRI_INFO_V1V2_CONVEX;
00294                                                 break;
00295                                         }
00296                                 }
00297 
00298                                 break;
00299                         }
00300                 default:
00301                         {
00302                                 //                              printf("warning: duplicate triangle\n");
00303                         }
00304 
00305                 }
00306         }
00307 };
00310 
00311 void btGenerateInternalEdgeInfo (btBvhTriangleMeshShape*trimeshShape, btTriangleInfoMap* triangleInfoMap)
00312 {
00313         //the user pointer shouldn't already be used for other purposes, we intend to store connectivity info there!
00314         if (trimeshShape->getTriangleInfoMap())
00315                 return;
00316 
00317         trimeshShape->setTriangleInfoMap(triangleInfoMap);
00318 
00319         btStridingMeshInterface* meshInterface = trimeshShape->getMeshInterface();
00320         const btVector3& meshScaling = meshInterface->getScaling();
00321 
00322         for (int partId = 0; partId< meshInterface->getNumSubParts();partId++)
00323         {
00324                 const unsigned char *vertexbase = 0;
00325                 int numverts = 0;
00326                 PHY_ScalarType type = PHY_INTEGER;
00327                 int stride = 0;
00328                 const unsigned char *indexbase = 0;
00329                 int indexstride = 0;
00330                 int numfaces = 0;
00331                 PHY_ScalarType indicestype = PHY_INTEGER;
00332                 //PHY_ScalarType indexType=0;
00333 
00334                 btVector3 triangleVerts[3];
00335                 meshInterface->getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase(&vertexbase,numverts,   type,stride,&indexbase,indexstride,numfaces,indicestype,partId);
00336                 btVector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00337 
00338                 for (int triangleIndex = 0 ; triangleIndex < numfaces;triangleIndex++)
00339                 {
00340                         unsigned int* gfxbase = (unsigned int*)(indexbase+triangleIndex*indexstride);
00341 
00342                         for (int j=2;j>=0;j--)
00343                         {
00344 
00345                                 int graphicsindex = indicestype==PHY_SHORT?((unsigned short*)gfxbase)[j]:gfxbase[j];
00346                                 if (type == PHY_FLOAT)
00347                                 {
00348                                         float* graphicsbase = (float*)(vertexbase+graphicsindex*stride);
00349                                         triangleVerts[j] = btVector3(
00350                                                 graphicsbase[0]*meshScaling.getX(),
00351                                                 graphicsbase[1]*meshScaling.getY(),
00352                                                 graphicsbase[2]*meshScaling.getZ());
00353                                 }
00354                                 else
00355                                 {
00356                                         double* graphicsbase = (double*)(vertexbase+graphicsindex*stride);
00357                                         triangleVerts[j] = btVector3( btScalar(graphicsbase[0]*meshScaling.getX()), btScalar(graphicsbase[1]*meshScaling.getY()), btScalar(graphicsbase[2]*meshScaling.getZ()));
00358                                 }
00359                         }
00360                         aabbMin.setValue(btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
00361                         aabbMax.setValue(btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT)); 
00362                         aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[0]);
00363                         aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[0]);
00364                         aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[1]);
00365                         aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[1]);
00366                         aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[2]);
00367                         aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[2]);
00368 
00369                         btConnectivityProcessor connectivityProcessor;
00370                         connectivityProcessor.m_partIdA = partId;
00371                         connectivityProcessor.m_triangleIndexA = triangleIndex;
00372                         connectivityProcessor.m_triangleVerticesA = &triangleVerts[0];
00373                         connectivityProcessor.m_triangleInfoMap  = triangleInfoMap;
00374 
00375                         trimeshShape->processAllTriangles(&connectivityProcessor,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00376                 }
00377 
00378         }
00379 
00380 }

00384 
00385 // Given a point and a line segment (defined by two points), compute the closest point
00386 // in the line.  Cap the point at the endpoints of the line segment.
00387 void btNearestPointInLineSegment(const btVector3 &point, const btVector3& line0, const btVector3& line1, btVector3& nearestPoint)
00388 {
00389         btVector3 lineDelta     = line1 - line0;
00390 
00391         // Handle degenerate lines
00392         if ( lineDelta.fuzzyZero())
00393         {
00394                 nearestPoint = line0;
00395         }
00396         else
00397         {
00398                 btScalar delta = (point-line0).dot(lineDelta) / (lineDelta).dot(lineDelta);
00399 
00400                 // Clamp the point to conform to the segment's endpoints
00401                 if ( delta < 0 )
00402                         delta = 0;
00403                 else if ( delta > 1 )
00404                         delta = 1;
00405 
00406                 nearestPoint = line0 + lineDelta*delta;
00407         }
00408 }

00411 
00412 
00413 bool    btClampNormal(const btVector3& edge,const btVector3& tri_normal_org,const btVector3& localContactNormalOnB, btScalar correctedEdgeAngle, btVector3 & clampedLocalNormal)
00414 {
00415         btVector3 tri_normal = tri_normal_org;
00416         //we only have a local triangle normal, not a local contact normal -> only normal in world space...
00417         //either compute the current angle all in local space, or all in world space
00418 
00419         btVector3 edgeCross = edge.cross(tri_normal).normalize();
00420         btScalar curAngle = btGetAngle(edgeCross,tri_normal,localContactNormalOnB);
00421 
00422         if (correctedEdgeAngle<0)
00423         {
00424                 if (curAngle < correctedEdgeAngle)
00425                 {
00426                         btScalar diffAngle = correctedEdgeAngle-curAngle;
00427                         btQuaternion rotation(edge,diffAngle );
00428                         clampedLocalNormal = btMatrix3x3(rotation)*localContactNormalOnB;
00429                         return true;
00430                 }
00431         }
00432 
00433         if (correctedEdgeAngle>=0)
00434         {
00435                 if (curAngle > correctedEdgeAngle)
00436                 {
00437                         btScalar diffAngle = correctedEdgeAngle-curAngle;
00438                         btQuaternion rotation(edge,diffAngle );
00439                         clampedLocalNormal = btMatrix3x3(rotation)*localContactNormalOnB;
00440                         return true;
00441                 }
00442         }
00443         return false;
00444 }

00447 
00449 void btAdjustInternalEdgeContacts(btManifoldPoint& cp, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObj0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObj1Wrap, int partId0, int index0, int normalAdjustFlags)
00450 {
00451         //btAssert(colObj0->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType() == TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE);
00452         if (colObj0Wrap->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType() != TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE)
00453                 return;
00454 
00455         btBvhTriangleMeshShape* trimesh = 0;
00456         
00457         if( colObj0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType() == SCALED_TRIANGLE_MESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE )
00458            trimesh = ((btScaledBvhTriangleMeshShape*)colObj0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionShape())->getChildShape();
00459    else    
00460            trimesh = (btBvhTriangleMeshShape*)colObj0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionShape();
00461            
00462         btTriangleInfoMap* triangleInfoMapPtr = (btTriangleInfoMap*) trimesh->getTriangleInfoMap();
00463         if (!triangleInfoMapPtr)
00464                 return;
00465 
00466         int hash = btGetHash(partId0,index0);
00467 
00468 
00469         btTriangleInfo* info = triangleInfoMapPtr->find(hash);
00470         if (!info)
00471                 return;
00472 
00473         btScalar frontFacing = (normalAdjustFlags & BT_TRIANGLE_CONVEX_BACKFACE_MODE)==0? 1.f : -1.f;
00474         
00475         const btTriangleShape* tri_shape = static_cast<const btTriangleShape*>(colObj0Wrap->getCollisionShape());
00476         btVector3 v0,v1,v2;
00477         tri_shape->getVertex(0,v0);
00478         tri_shape->getVertex(1,v1);
00479         tri_shape->getVertex(2,v2);
00480 
00481         //btVector3 center = (v0+v1+v2)*btScalar(1./3.);
00482 
00483         btVector3 red(1,0,0), green(0,1,0),blue(0,0,1),white(1,1,1),black(0,0,0);
00484         btVector3 tri_normal;
00485         tri_shape->calcNormal(tri_normal);
00486 
00487         //btScalar dot = tri_normal.dot(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00488         btVector3 nearest;
00489         btNearestPointInLineSegment(cp.m_localPointB,v0,v1,nearest);
00490 
00491         btVector3 contact = cp.m_localPointB;
00492 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00493         const btTransform& tr = colObj0->getWorldTransform();
00494         btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*cp.m_localPointB,red);
00495 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00496 
00497 
00498 
00499         bool isNearEdge = false;
00500 
00501         int numConcaveEdgeHits = 0;
00502         int numConvexEdgeHits = 0;
00503 
00504         btVector3 localContactNormalOnB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis().transpose() * cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00505         localContactNormalOnB.normalize();//is this necessary?
00506         
00507         // Get closest edge
00508         int      bestedge=-1;
00509         btScalar    disttobestedge=BT_LARGE_FLOAT;
00510         //
00511         // Edge 0 -> 1
00512         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV0V1Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00513         {       
00514            btVector3 nearest;
00515            btNearestPointInLineSegment( cp.m_localPointB, v0, v1, nearest );
00516            btScalar     len=(contact-nearest).length();
00517            //
00518            if( len < disttobestedge )
00519            {
00520               bestedge=0;
00521               disttobestedge=len;
00522       }       
00523    }       
00524         // Edge 1 -> 2
00525         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV1V2Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00526         {       
00527            btVector3 nearest;
00528            btNearestPointInLineSegment( cp.m_localPointB, v1, v2, nearest );
00529            btScalar     len=(contact-nearest).length();
00530            //
00531            if( len < disttobestedge )
00532            {
00533               bestedge=1;
00534               disttobestedge=len;
00535       }       
00536    }       
00537         // Edge 2 -> 0
00538         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV2V0Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00539         {       
00540            btVector3 nearest;
00541            btNearestPointInLineSegment( cp.m_localPointB, v2, v0, nearest );
00542            btScalar     len=(contact-nearest).length();
00543            //
00544            if( len < disttobestedge )
00545            {
00546               bestedge=2;
00547               disttobestedge=len;
00548       }       
00549    }            
00550         
00551 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00552    btVector3 upfix=tri_normal * btVector3(0.1f,0.1f,0.1f);
00553    btDebugDrawLine(tr * v0 + upfix, tr * v1 + upfix, red );
00554 #endif   
00555         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV0V1Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00556         {
00557 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00558                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*contact,tr*(contact+cp.m_normalWorldOnB*10),black);
00559 #endif
00560                 btScalar len = (contact-nearest).length();
00561                 if(len<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_edgeDistanceThreshold)
00562                 if( bestedge==0 )
00563                 {
00564                         btVector3 edge(v0-v1);
00565                         isNearEdge = true;
00566 
00567                         if (info->m_edgeV0V1Angle==btScalar(0))
00568                         {
00569                                 numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00570                         } else
00571                         {
00572 
00573                                 bool isEdgeConvex = (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V0V1_CONVEX);
00574                                 btScalar swapFactor = isEdgeConvex ? btScalar(1) : btScalar(-1);
00575         #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00576                                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*(nearest+swapFactor*tri_normal*10),white);
00577         #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00578 
00579                                 btVector3 nA = swapFactor * tri_normal;
00580 
00581                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,info->m_edgeV0V1Angle);
00582                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,tri_normal);
00583                                 if (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V0V1_SWAP_NORMALB)
00584                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00585                                 btVector3 nB = swapFactor*computedNormalB;
00586 
00587                                 btScalar        NdotA = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nA);
00588                                 btScalar        NdotB = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nB);
00589                                 bool backFacingNormal = (NdotA< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon) && (NdotB<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon);
00590 
00591 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00592                                 {
00593                                         
00594                                         btDebugDrawLine(cp.getPositionWorldOnB(),cp.getPositionWorldOnB()+tr.getBasis()*(nB*20),red);
00595                                 }
00596 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00597 
00598 
00599                                 if (backFacingNormal)
00600                                 {
00601                                         numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00602                                 }
00603                                 else
00604                                 {
00605                                         numConvexEdgeHits++;
00606                                         btVector3 clampedLocalNormal;
00607                                         bool isClamped = btClampNormal(edge,swapFactor*tri_normal,localContactNormalOnB, info->m_edgeV0V1Angle,clampedLocalNormal);
00608                                         if (isClamped)
00609                                         {
00610                                                 if (((normalAdjustFlags & BT_TRIANGLE_CONVEX_DOUBLE_SIDED)!=0) || (clampedLocalNormal.dot(frontFacing*tri_normal)>0))
00611                                                 {
00612                                                         btVector3 newNormal = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis() * clampedLocalNormal;
00613                                                         //                                      cp.m_distance1 = cp.m_distance1 * newNormal.dot(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00614                                                         cp.m_normalWorldOnB = newNormal;
00615                                                         // Reproject collision point along normal. (what about cp.m_distance1?)
00616                                                         cp.m_positionWorldOnB = cp.m_positionWorldOnA - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * cp.m_distance1;
00617                                                         cp.m_localPointB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().invXform(cp.m_positionWorldOnB);
00618                                                         
00619                                                 }
00620                                         }
00621                                 }
00622                         }
00623                 }
00624         }
00625 
00626         btNearestPointInLineSegment(contact,v1,v2,nearest);
00627 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00628         btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*cp.m_localPointB,green);
00629 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00630 
00631 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00632    btDebugDrawLine(tr * v1 + upfix, tr * v2 + upfix , green );
00633 #endif   
00634 
00635         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV1V2Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00636         {
00637 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00638                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*contact,tr*(contact+cp.m_normalWorldOnB*10),black);
00639 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00640 
00641 
00642 
00643                 btScalar len = (contact-nearest).length();
00644                 if(len<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_edgeDistanceThreshold)
00645                 if( bestedge==1 )
00646                 {
00647                         isNearEdge = true;
00648 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00649                         btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*(nearest+tri_normal*10),white);
00650 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00651 
00652                         btVector3 edge(v1-v2);
00653 
00654                         isNearEdge = true;
00655 
00656                         if (info->m_edgeV1V2Angle == btScalar(0))
00657                         {
00658                                 numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00659                         } else
00660                         {
00661                                 bool isEdgeConvex = (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V1V2_CONVEX)!=0;
00662                                 btScalar swapFactor = isEdgeConvex ? btScalar(1) : btScalar(-1);
00663         #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00664                                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*(nearest+swapFactor*tri_normal*10),white);
00665         #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00666 
00667                                 btVector3 nA = swapFactor * tri_normal;
00668                                 
00669                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,info->m_edgeV1V2Angle);
00670                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,tri_normal);
00671                                 if (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V1V2_SWAP_NORMALB)
00672                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00673                                 btVector3 nB = swapFactor*computedNormalB;
00674 
00675 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00676                                 {
00677                                         btDebugDrawLine(cp.getPositionWorldOnB(),cp.getPositionWorldOnB()+tr.getBasis()*(nB*20),red);
00678                                 }
00679 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00680 
00681 
00682                                 btScalar        NdotA = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nA);
00683                                 btScalar        NdotB = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nB);
00684                                 bool backFacingNormal = (NdotA< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon) && (NdotB<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon);
00685 
00686                                 if (backFacingNormal)
00687                                 {
00688                                         numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00689                                 }
00690                                 else
00691                                 {
00692                                         numConvexEdgeHits++;
00693                                         btVector3 localContactNormalOnB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis().transpose() * cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00694                                         btVector3 clampedLocalNormal;
00695                                         bool isClamped = btClampNormal(edge,swapFactor*tri_normal,localContactNormalOnB, info->m_edgeV1V2Angle,clampedLocalNormal);
00696                                         if (isClamped)
00697                                         {
00698                                                 if (((normalAdjustFlags & BT_TRIANGLE_CONVEX_DOUBLE_SIDED)!=0) || (clampedLocalNormal.dot(frontFacing*tri_normal)>0))
00699                                                 {
00700                                                         btVector3 newNormal = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis() * clampedLocalNormal;
00701                                                         //                                      cp.m_distance1 = cp.m_distance1 * newNormal.dot(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00702                                                         cp.m_normalWorldOnB = newNormal;
00703                                                         // Reproject collision point along normal.
00704                                                         cp.m_positionWorldOnB = cp.m_positionWorldOnA - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * cp.m_distance1;
00705                                                         cp.m_localPointB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().invXform(cp.m_positionWorldOnB);
00706                                                 }
00707                                         }
00708                                 }
00709                         }
00710                 }
00711         }
00712 
00713         btNearestPointInLineSegment(contact,v2,v0,nearest);
00714 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00715         btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*cp.m_localPointB,blue);
00716 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00717 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00718    btDebugDrawLine(tr * v2 + upfix, tr * v0 + upfix , blue );
00719 #endif   
00720 
00721         if (btFabs(info->m_edgeV2V0Angle)< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_maxEdgeAngleThreshold)
00722         {
00723 
00724 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00725                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*contact,tr*(contact+cp.m_normalWorldOnB*10),black);
00726 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00727 
00728                 btScalar len = (contact-nearest).length();
00729                 if(len<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_edgeDistanceThreshold)
00730                 if( bestedge==2 )
00731                 {
00732                         isNearEdge = true;
00733 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00734                         btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*(nearest+tri_normal*10),white);
00735 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00736 
00737                         btVector3 edge(v2-v0);
00738 
00739                         if (info->m_edgeV2V0Angle==btScalar(0))
00740                         {
00741                                 numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00742                         } else
00743                         {
00744 
00745                                 bool isEdgeConvex = (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V2V0_CONVEX)!=0;
00746                                 btScalar swapFactor = isEdgeConvex ? btScalar(1) : btScalar(-1);
00747         #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00748                                 btDebugDrawLine(tr*nearest,tr*(nearest+swapFactor*tri_normal*10),white);
00749         #endif //BT_INTERNAL_EDGE_DEBUG_DRAW
00750 
00751                                 btVector3 nA = swapFactor * tri_normal;
00752                                 btQuaternion orn(edge,info->m_edgeV2V0Angle);
00753                                 btVector3 computedNormalB = quatRotate(orn,tri_normal);
00754                                 if (info->m_flags & TRI_INFO_V2V0_SWAP_NORMALB)
00755                                         computedNormalB*=-1;
00756                                 btVector3 nB = swapFactor*computedNormalB;
00757 
00758 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00759                                 {
00760                                         btDebugDrawLine(cp.getPositionWorldOnB(),cp.getPositionWorldOnB()+tr.getBasis()*(nB*20),red);
00761                                 }
00762 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00763 
00764                                 btScalar        NdotA = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nA);
00765                                 btScalar        NdotB = localContactNormalOnB.dot(nB);
00766                                 bool backFacingNormal = (NdotA< triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon) && (NdotB<triangleInfoMapPtr->m_convexEpsilon);
00767 
00768                                 if (backFacingNormal)
00769                                 {
00770                                         numConcaveEdgeHits++;
00771                                 }
00772                                 else
00773                                 {
00774                                         numConvexEdgeHits++;
00775                                         //                              printf("hitting convex edge\n");
00776 
00777 
00778                                         btVector3 localContactNormalOnB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis().transpose() * cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00779                                         btVector3 clampedLocalNormal;
00780                                         bool isClamped = btClampNormal(edge,swapFactor*tri_normal,localContactNormalOnB,info->m_edgeV2V0Angle,clampedLocalNormal);
00781                                         if (isClamped)
00782                                         {
00783                                                 if (((normalAdjustFlags & BT_TRIANGLE_CONVEX_DOUBLE_SIDED)!=0) || (clampedLocalNormal.dot(frontFacing*tri_normal)>0))
00784                                                 {
00785                                                         btVector3 newNormal = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis() * clampedLocalNormal;
00786                                                         //                                      cp.m_distance1 = cp.m_distance1 * newNormal.dot(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00787                                                         cp.m_normalWorldOnB = newNormal;
00788                                                         // Reproject collision point along normal.
00789                                                         cp.m_positionWorldOnB = cp.m_positionWorldOnA - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * cp.m_distance1;
00790                                                         cp.m_localPointB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().invXform(cp.m_positionWorldOnB);
00791                                                 }
00792                                         }
00793                                 } 
00794                         }
00795                         
00796 
00797                 }
00798         }
00799 
00800 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00801         {
00802                 btVector3 color(0,1,1);
00803                 btDebugDrawLine(cp.getPositionWorldOnB(),cp.getPositionWorldOnB()+cp.m_normalWorldOnB*10,color);
00804         }
00805 #endif //DEBUG_INTERNAL_EDGE
00806 
00807         if (isNearEdge)
00808         {
00809 
00810                 if (numConcaveEdgeHits>0)
00811                 {
00812                         if ((normalAdjustFlags & BT_TRIANGLE_CONCAVE_DOUBLE_SIDED)!=0)
00813                         {
00814                                 //fix tri_normal so it pointing the same direction as the current local contact normal
00815                                 if (tri_normal.dot(localContactNormalOnB) < 0)
00816                                 {
00817                                         tri_normal *= -1;
00818                                 }
00819                                 cp.m_normalWorldOnB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis()*tri_normal;
00820                         } else
00821                         {
00822                                 btVector3 newNormal = tri_normal *frontFacing;
00823                                 //if the tri_normal is pointing opposite direction as the current local contact normal, skip it
00824                                 btScalar d = newNormal.dot(localContactNormalOnB) ;
00825                                 if (d< 0)
00826                                 {
00827                                         return;
00828                                 }
00829                                 //modify the normal to be the triangle normal (or backfacing normal)
00830                                 cp.m_normalWorldOnB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().getBasis() *newNormal;
00831                         }
00832                                                 
00833                         // Reproject collision point along normal.
00834                         cp.m_positionWorldOnB = cp.m_positionWorldOnA - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * cp.m_distance1;
00835                         cp.m_localPointB = colObj0Wrap->getWorldTransform().invXform(cp.m_positionWorldOnB);
00836                 }
00837         }
